caption: The whisper of divine surrender, a dance of grace and will

A central luminous form, reminiscent of a dove's wing, hovers amidst swirling currents of color, symbolizing the Spirit's whisper. The background transitions from deep violets to warm whites, echoing the transformation of fear into courage.
